body: The following includes notes from slides, including key points taken from the slides/presenter. Feedback and questions are also included as hyperlinked footnotes, which return to the relevant section of the document. (Typos may run rampant.)

Question - Markdown Footnote.description: Insert a footnote to indicate questions or comments. Place cursor at the end of the line before using.
